MajorArcana.name: The Empress
MajorArcana.effect: The player is blessed with temporary fortune; gold rains from the sky, totaling 1d10 × 100 GP.

MajorArcana.name: Death
MajorArcana.effect: The player dies and is immediately resurrected with one major attribute (randomly chosen) permanently altered.

MajorArcana.name: Justice
MajorArcana.effect: The player’s alignment is magically adjusted to true neutral, with a divine entity ensuring fairness in their future decisions.

MajorArcana.name: The High Priestess
MajorArcana.effect: The player receives cryptic guidance in their dreams, revealing a future event or danger.

MajorArcana.name: Strength
MajorArcana.effect: The player gains a +5 bonus to Strength for one hour but is cursed with exhaustion afterward.

MajorArcana.name: The Devil
MajorArcana.effect: A devil appears, offering a powerful artifact in exchange for the player’s soul or another dire cost.

MajorArcana.name: The Hanged Man
MajorArcana.effect: The player is frozen in time for 1d4 days, emerging with profound knowledge of the cosmos (+2 Intelligence).

MajorArcana.name: The Magician
MajorArcana.effect: The player gains the ability to cast one spell from any class list as if they were a 20th-level caster for the next 24 hours.

MajorArcana.name: The Hierophant
MajorArcana.effect: The player is granted divine insight into a current dilemma but becomes bound to a geas by a powerful deity.
